properties.areaDesc: Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains; Northeast Bighorn Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 4 at 2:48PM MST until February 7 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Potential heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2
feet possible.

* WHERE...In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. In Montana,
Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains.

* WHEN...From late Wednesday afternoon through Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Recreation in the high country will be impacted by
heavy accumulating snowfall.
properties.instruction:
Be prepared for difficult winter conditions.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT
